description:
Presenting speaker, Dan Wilson

We've enjoyed CSS transitions and animations for a few years now, with their broad support and ability to latch onto hardware acceleration. Now the Web Animations API is coming (and already polyfilled!), so what does this let us do through JavaScript?

Through several examples, we will take a look at how this new JavaScript API came to be and how it compares to what has come before it. Most importantly, we will work through its added benefits like timelines, controls, and its dynamic nature.

http://frontporch.io/resource/
title: Fun with the Web Animations API
